=== 1.0.2 / 2009-10-17

* 1 bugfix

  * Generated migration now uses UTC time rather than local time.

=== 1.0.1 / 2009-04-14

* 1 minor enhancement

  * Textical adds a rake task to generate FTS index migrations.  Just run:

      rake textical:migration

=== 1.0.0 / 2009-04-14

* 1 major enhancement

  * Birthday!
